## GUI Conventions

This section describes the uniform styles that will be used throughout this manual.

* Menu selection: `r menuselection('Quality Control','QC check: One station',Rainfall,'Zeros check')`
* Toolbar icons: ![][savetable]

* Button: `r button(Cancel)`

* Tabs: `r onglet(Options)`
* Checkbox: `r checkbox('Use elevation')`
* Radio button:  `r radiobutton('Use elevation')`
* Dropdown list: This ![][dropdownarrow] is listbox
* Spinbox, select a number: ![][spinbox]
* Browse for a file or directory: ![][browsebutf]

* Zoom in non-active: ![][zoomin0]
* Zoom in active: ![][zoomin1]

* Redraw map non-active: ![][redrawmap0]
* Redraw map  active: ![][redrawmap1]
